text: So I bought her for fifteen shekels of silver 3:2 15 shekels is approximately 6 ounces or 171 grams of silver. and a homer and a lethech of barley.3:2 Or a homer and a half of barley; that is, a total of approximately 9.36 bushels or 330 liters (probably about 436 pounds or 198 kilograms of barley); LXX a homer of barley and a wineskin full of wine
